# proposal

**Instance Property**

The proposal for how to incorporate the dropped items.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var proposal: UITableViewDropProposal { get }
```

## Discussion

If your drag delegate implements the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableViewDropDelegate/tableView(_:dropSessionDidUpdate:withDestinationIndexPath:)] method, this object contains the information that you provided when making your drop proposal for the given location.

## Getting the session information

- **session**: The drop session containing information about the transaction.

items.description: The drop session containing information about the transaction.
